name: Warhorse Skeleton
description: A skeletal warhorse, animated by dark necromantic magic. It serves as a mount for undead riders or as a guardian in tombs.
memorable: Charged into battle without hesitation, its bones clattering with every movement.
goals: To serve undead riders or guard ancient tombs.
relations: Often accompanies undead knights or necromancers.
strengths: Resilient to pain and damage, remains tireless in battle.
additional_information: Stripped of flesh, resembling only skeletal remains.
Maintains a relentless drive to serve its purpose.
test_queries: fearless skeletal steed in ancient tombs
tireless skeleton horse with a charge attack
